tp:docstring.p: This interface defines properties used to control acceptance policy on incoming communication for an account
Values to define acceptance policy for a certain kind of incoming communication based on the status of the initiator contact.
Any remote contact can contact the local user.
Only contacts in the buddy list or the authorized contacts (in Telepathy, members of the "stored" contact list) can contact the local user.
